column4: hi i upgraded to hoary on another machine, now i get the following error when logging into gnome: your session only lasted less than 10 seconds, if you have not logged out yourself this could mean that there is some installation problem
anyone know what might be causing that? nvidia drivers?
i had that problem before. It was fixed later though. Perhaps you need to upgrade again? (slow mirror?)
it worked for me when i upgraded again later on. Do you use a mirror for ubuntu?
